name: infected army vs zombie contract Hunter
name_original: infected army vs zombie contract Hunter
description:
infected army vs zombie contract Hunter

Free to Play & Download on Google Play Store.

Zombie Contract Hunter is an action game with blood-shedding scenes.

It is a simple and addicting,puzzle and shooting game with HQ graphics.

Zombie Shooter in a 3D environment can come from all the city.
You need to pull the dead trigger to kill them.

Amazing action scenes and gaming experience that will blow your mind await you! To get in on the fun, all you have to do is download now!
Save the world from an outbreak of soldiers turned into ghoul.When you're walking among the dead your only option is to kill.
Zombies are weak at the neck and head part, so try to shoot them at head part to see the head shot effect.

GAME FEATURES

=> HD realistic graphics and high standard CD game sounds
=> Improve your skills
=> Kill different zombies.
=> Easy and smooth game controls
